movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully plant an idea into someone's mind.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.
